title: Hour 2: Will the Real MVP Please Stand Up?
description:
Stephen A. is all in on Luka Doncic winning the MVP. Jessica Mendosa joins the show to breakdown all of the MLB Postseason action. Spots Betting analyst Joe Fortenbaugh likes the Cowboys to score a lot in Dak Prescott's return. Last Take! Kendrick Perkins and Stephen A. give their thoughts on tonight's NBA slate.
